description:
IPFS Lite node with modern UI to support standard use cases of IPFS
Odin is a decentralized peer-to-peer application with the focus of publishing data to others peers.
The basic characteristics are decentralized, respect of personal data, open source, free of charge,
free of advertising and legally impeccable.
The application based on libp2p technologies to fulfill the decentralized aspect of the application.
